content.headcontent: TBC was launched as a government company wholly owned by the Public Investment Fund and with limited liability operating on commercial bases specializing in project management
content.headcontenttwo: TBC undertakes the projects of school and educational buildings and administrative facilities of the Ministry of Education, and offers its tenders and award of the same in accordance with its regulations
content.headcontentthree: The company's activities include designing, constructing, executing, and supervising the educational buildings and supporting facilities. It also provides all services ranging from consulting administrative
content.headcontentfour: and planning services up to maintenance, rehabilitation, equipment and furnishing.

content.terms1: 1-The user acknowledges full responsibility for personal use of the system in accordance with the established purposes and uses. The user also acknowledges responsibility for the execution of transactions performed by its authorized person. The Company shall not bear any damages, consequences, losses or indemnities resulting from the non-commitment by the user to any of the aforementioned. The user shall be responsible for the validity, correctness , accuracy and regulatory compliance of all processes performed and information provided or exchanged through using the services.
content.terms2: 2-The user shall keep personal log-in details confidential and the user shall be deemed responsible for any unauthorized use and all consequences, losses and damages which may result from such unauthorized use whether they were direct or indirect on the part of the Company or the user.
content.terms3: 3-The user acknowledges that he has no ownership rights in the intellectual and publication rights of the programs and documents related to the online service; and agrees that it shall not allow its users to copy, amend, download or transfer the online service programs to similar electronic devices. All files, documents and information submitted to the system are deemed to be the intellectual property of the Company.
content.terms4: 4-The user shall keep confidential all information and documentation related to his dealings with the company and all correspondence with the company and any data or other information or documents reached through his dealings with the company and any data, information or other documents or correspondence related to the company . The user also undertakes during and after finishing his dealings with the company not to disclose any data or information or documents to others and not to be exploited in any way.
content.terms5: 5-The Company shall not be liable for any computer virus or problems related to the information provided by the Company and arising out of the services provided by any of the information providers or result from the user PC. The Company shall not be responsible also for any piracy or fraud actions.
content.terms6: 6-The user confirms that all information and supporting documentation submitted is true and further confirms that he has checked the accuracy and completeness of the information and supporting documentation. The user understands that in the event that untrue, false, misleading or incomplete information is submitted that the company has the right to reject his bid and deprive him from bidding in the future.
content.terms7: 7-The Company shall have the right to reject, for whatever reason, any request related to log in or access to the system as well as any instructions or inquiries which come from the user through the system without justification.
